name: Office Simulator
description:
Try to turn a small garage start-up into a large company. Make strategic decisions by hiring and training employees to increase the productivity of your business.
You're the boss, this is why you must to be careful with your decisions. A bad one and your company can go bankrupt in a few days!

Game Features:
▶ The rich set of goals and objectives
- Manage Your Office Space
- Hire/Train/Fire your employees
